$:/_xp/Stylesheet/popup-on-hover.title: $:/_xp/Stylesheet/popup-on-hover
$:/_xp/Stylesheet/popup-on-hover.text:
< !-- see also: $: /ak/plugins/TWCrossLinks -->

.poh-container {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
}

.poh-container .poh-content {
  visibility: hidden;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin-top: -2em;
  padding: 0 18px;
  display: block;

  /* Position the tooltip */
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 80;

  float: right;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;

  border: 1px solid <<colour tab-border>>;
  border-radius: 3px;
  background-color: <<colour page-background>>;
  white-space: nowrap;
  text-shadow: none;
  word-break: normal;
  word-wrap: break-word;
  white-space: pre;
  white-space: pre-wrap;
}

.poh-container .poh-content::after {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  border: 1px;
}

.poh-content {
  width: 90vw;
  max-width: 32em;
}

.poh-container:hover>.poh-content {
  margin-top: 3px;
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
  transition: 0.25s all ease;
  transition-delay: 0.75s;
}

$:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary.title: $:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary
$:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary.caption: Kookma Plugin Library
$:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary.text:
Kookma plugin library is a set of plugins, themes, and scripts, to extend functionality and add new features to Tiddlywiki. For detail information visit the library at [[GitHub|https://github.com/kookma]]. It is recommended to backup your data before installing any plugin, theme, or script. 

To use in other wikis, drag and drop this link to those wikis: [[Kookma Plugin Library|$:/config/KookmaPluginLibrary]]

$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.title: $:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.caption: <$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang"><$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]">太微中文社区插件源(~GitHub版)</$list><$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]">TiddlyWiki CPL(~GitHub Host)</$list></$list>
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.creator: Sttot
$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/GitHub.text:
<!-- lang变量就是当前语言 -->
<$list filter="[[$:/language]get[text]removeprefix[$:/languages/]else[en-GB]]" variable="lang">
<$list filter="[<lang>search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

欢迎使用''【太微中文社区插件源】''！

本插件源是由[[太微(TiddlyWiki)中文社区|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]]维护的、致力于搜集网络上所有与 ~TiddlyWiki5 有关插件的、希望为中国以及全世界的太微用户提供一键安装、更新插件体验的公开插件源。

如果还不了解该如何使用太微和本插件源，欢迎阅读[[中文社区共建的太微（TiddlyWiki）教程|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]里插件相关的部分。如上提到的插件源和教程皆为开源项目，你可以在 [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] 中找到并参与贡献！如果乐意，可以通过QQ群等方式加入我们，详情请见如上提到的中文教程。

要添加这个插件库到你的 Wiki 中，只需鼠标拖动这个链接到你的 Wiki 里即可：<$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

注意：本插件源版本为 ~GitHub Page 的版本，更新更快，但是可能需要科学上网手段。如果你在国内，而且不清楚什么是“科学上网”，请选用另一个经过 netlify.app 加速的[[版本|$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify]]，虽然更新有一定的延迟，但对国内用户更加友好。

@@color:red;''安装任何插件前，请记得备份你的Wiki，本插件源无法为插件造成的个人损失负责！''@@

</$list>

<$list filter="[<lang>!search:title[zh]]" variable="lang">

Welcome to the ''[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community Plugin Source]''!

This plugin source is maintained by the [[TiddlyWiki Chinese Community]] and is dedicated to collecting all TiddlyWiki5 related plugins on the web, hoping to provide a one-click installation and update plugin experience for TiddlyWiki users in China and around the world.

If you don't know how to use TiddlyWiki and this source, you are welcome to read the plugins related section in the [[TiddlyWiki Tutorials for Chinese Communities|https://tw-cn.netlify.app]]. As mentioned above, both the plugin source and the tutorial are open source projects, you can find them in [[GitHub|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly]] and participate in contributing! If you like, you can join us through QQ groups and other means, see the Chinese tutorials mentioned above for details.

To add this plugin library to your Wiki, just drag this link with your mouse into your Wiki: <$link to=<<currentTiddler>>>{{!!caption}}</$link>

Note: The source version of this plugin is the ~GitHub Page version, which is faster to update, but may require scientific Internet access. If you are in China and are not sure what GFW is, please use another [[version|$:/config/TiddlyWiki-CPL/Netlify]] that is accelerated by netlify.app, although there is a certain delay in updating, but it is more friendly to domestic users more friendly.

@@color:red;''Please remember to back up your Wiki before installing any plugins, this plugin source cannot be held responsible for personal losses caused by plugins!''@@

</$list>
</$list>

$:/help/TiddlerType.title: $:/help/TiddlerType
$:/help/TiddlerType.text:
! TiddlyWiki 中条目的类别 @@.list-tree 三种分类方式： * ''所有条目'' //构成整个维基的所有条目//

** 根据条目是否被封装在插件中，分为 *** ''用户条目''（Ordinary Tiddlers） //未封装到插件中的条目。用户可以直接永久删除。// **** Ordinary 在这里可以理解为「常见的」条目。 *** ''默认条目''（Shadow Tiddlers） //被封装在插件中的条目。用户无法直接修改删除。//

** 根据标题的前缀，分为 *** ''普通条目''（Standard Tiddlers） //标题前缀不为 `$:/`。可作为普通标签// *** ''系统条目''（System Tiddlers） //标题前缀为 `$:/`：以浅色文本显示标题前缀；指针悬停于故事河中条目标题的上方时会有提示。可作为系统标签//

** 根据内容类型，即条目的 `type` 字段进行分类。详见 [[ContentType|https://tiddlywiki.com/static/ContentType.html]]。
''用法举例：''[[高级查找|$:/AdvancedSearch]] 中可以搜索到所有条目。 * 搜索「用户条目」 ** Standard 选项卡：搜索其中的普通条目； ** System 选项卡：搜索其中的系统条目。

* 搜索「默认条目」 ** Shadows 选项卡。（字体未加粗的链接，表示该条目已被同名的用户条目所改写） @@

$:/xp/ui/Buttons/reorder-tabs.title: $:/xp/ui/Buttons/reorder-tabs
$:/xp/ui/Buttons/reorder-tabs.text:
\whitespace trim
\define beforeTitle() $:/xp/ui/SideBar/AdvancedSearch
<$button tooltip="Double-click to reordering" aria-label="reorder sidebar tabs">
Reorder
<!-- 取得排序列表 -->
<$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/temp/sidebar-tabs-orderlist" list />
<!-- The caption string starts with a word character ([a-zA-Z0-9_]) -->
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]!has[draft.of]regexp:caption[^\w]]">
<$vars sortPrefix={{{ [<currentTiddler>get[caption]addsuffix[@]] }}}>
<$vars sortTitle={{{ [<currentTiddler>addprefix<sortPrefix>] }}}>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/temp/sidebar-tabs-orderlist" $subfilter=<<sortTitle>>/>
</$vars>
</$vars>
</$list>
<!-- The caption string does not start with a word character -->
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]!has[draft.of]!regexp:caption[^\w]]">
<$vars sortPrefix={{{ [<currentTiddler>split[/]last[1]addsuffix[@]] }}}>
<$set name="sortTitle" filter="[<currentTiddler>match[TableOfContents]]" value={{{ [<currentTiddler>addprefix[Contents@]] }}} emptyValue={{{ [<currentTiddler>addprefix<sortPrefix>] }}}>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/temp/sidebar-tabs-orderlist" $subfilter=<<sortTitle>>/>
</$set>
</$vars>
</$list>

<!-- 排序标题列表 -->
<$action-deletefield $tiddler="$:/tags/SideBar" list />
<$list filter="[list[$:/temp/sidebar-tabs-orderlist]sort[]]">
<$vars sidebarTab={{{ [<currentTiddler>split[@]last[1]] }}}>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/tags/SideBar" $subfilter=<<sidebarTab>>/>
</$vars>
</$list>
<!-- Move frequently used tabs to the front -->
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/tags/SideBar" $subfilter="+[move:-99<beforeTitle>]"/>
<$list filter="$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open TableOfContents $:/core/ui/SideBar/Recent $:/core/ui/SideBar/Tools $:/core/ui/SideBar/More">
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/tags/SideBar" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:beforeTitle<currentTiddler>]"/>
</$list>
</$button>

$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate.title: $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate
$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate.caption: {{$:/language/Buttons/annotate/Caption}}
$:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate.text:
<$vars timestamp=<<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">>>
<$vars annotTitle={{{ [[$:/annotation/]addsuffix<timestamp>] }}}>
<$action-createtiddler
	$basetitle=<<annotTitle>>
	annotate-tiddler={{{ [<targetTiddler>get[draft.title]] }}}
/>
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="save-selection"
	tiddler=<<annotTitle>>
	field="annotate-text"
/>
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-edit-text-operation"
	$param="wrap-selection"
	prefix={{{ [[<<annotate """]] }}}
	suffix={{{ [[""" "]addsuffix[$:/annotation/]addsuffix<timestamp>addsuffix[">>]] }}}
/>
<!-- EDIT TIDDLER -->
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/sq/Stories]is[missing]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertafter<annotTitle>,<targetTiddler>]" />
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<annotTitle>> />
</$list>
<!-- xp -->
<!-- EDIT TIDDLER IN THE RIGHT COLUMN -->
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/sq/Stories]plugin-type[plugin]]" variable="ignore">
<$reveal state="$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/$:/plugins/sq/Stories" type="nomatch" text="yes">
<!-- adjust layout -->
<$list filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout]get[text]] +[else[fluid-fixed]match[fixed-fluid]]" variable="ignore">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout" text="fluid-fixed"/>
<$list filter="[[$:/xp/themetweaks/metrics/sidebarpaddingleft]is[shadow]]">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/xp/themetweaks/metrics/sidebarpaddingleft" text="{{$:/xp/themetweaks/metrics/sidebarpaddingleft/text}}"/>
</$list>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/sidebarlayout/fixedstory" text="yes"/>
</$list>
<!-- show right column -->
<$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" text="yes"/>
</$reveal>
<!-- edit tiddler -->
<$navigator story="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList" history="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList">
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<annotTitle>> />
</$navigator>
<$action-navigate $to=<<targetTiddler>> $scroll="yes" />
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/$:/plugins/sq/Stories" type="match" text="yes">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tv-story-list>> $subfilter="+[insertafter<annotTitle>,<targetTiddler>]" />
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param=<<annotTitle>> />
</$reveal>
</$list>
<!-- /xp -->
</$vars>
</$vars>

/>
